thread.title: Xherdan Shaqiri recreates THAT epic Euro 2016 bicycle kick for Switzerland in training
thread.title_full: Xherdan Shaqiri recreates THAT epic Euro 2016 bicycle kick for Switzerland in training

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Xherdan Shaqiri recreates THAT epic Euro 2016 bicycle kick for Switzerland in training
text:
Sport Xherdan Shaqiri recreates THAT epic Euro 2016 bicycle kick for Switzerland in training The Stoke star stunned the world in June last year when he produced a moment of magic against Poland in the competition's last-16 Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Shaqiri scores stunning overhead kick Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Xherdan Shaqiri has recreated the epic bicycle kick he scored against Poland in Euro 2016 in Swiss training. 
The Stoke star stunned the world in June last year when he produced a moment of sheer brilliance to take Switzerland's last-16 tie to extra time. 
With his national side trailing 1-0 going into the final 10 minutes, the winger knew something special was needed. 
Taking advantage of a high loose ball on the edge of the box, Shaqiri launched himself into the air and connected with the ball cleanly. Shaqiri scores stunner in training The comparison is uncanny (Photo: Getty) 
The ball took one bounce before finding its way into the back of the net. 
Away on international duty this week, ahead of Switzerland's 2018 World Cup qualifier against Latvia, Shaqiri has only gone and scored an exact replica. A different angle of Shaqiri's strike 
As seen in the video above, a cross comes in from the left and the 25-year-old pulls out yet another wonder strike. 
Take a bow.
